DOC.brief_summary: The aim study collect preliminary data effectiveness acupuncture treatment CIPN breast cancer patient .
DOC.detailed_description: Ideally 10 patient experience peripheral neuropathy due chemotherapy breast cancer treatment include study.They receive 16 total acupuncture treatment 10 week include various point base research classical text scalp acupuncture .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Minimum 18 year age 2 . Currently receive neurotoxic chemotherapy 3 . Experiencing symptom chemotherapy induce neuropathy least 1 month 4 . Have minimum score 3 VAS grade II CIPN NCICTC 5 . Willing sign inform consent 6 . Stable treatment two month screen Stable treatment define change type dose medication 2 month prior enrollment . Once enrolled , patient ask remain type dose medication neuropathy 1 . Receiving treatment prevent neuropathy 2 week prior screen 2 . Preexisting peripheral neuropathy due cause chemotherapy 3 . Preexisting condition like pregnancy , uncontrolled diabetes , hypertension , cardiovascular disorder , bleed disorder , depression ( BDI > 21 ) 4 . Unwilling follow protocol 5 . Individuals receive government disability assistance
